title: Brewing
description: The somewhat difficult brewing process rewards you with a diversity of Potions, which, through their effects, create a drunkeness that has never existed in Minecraft before.

title: Popcorn
description: I can't think of anything good to write here, but the song is great.

title: Muffin
description: The really good ones are all made from cookies!

title: Mini Cake
description: Finally available in a bakery near you! :D
